mapper.insert: insert into calendar(mid, cdcode, cdname, cdstate) values(#{mid}, #{cdcode}, #{cdname}, 'Y')
mapper.select: select nvl(max(cdcode),'CD00000') from calendar where mid = #{mid}
select distinct cdcode, cdname, cdstate from calendar where mid = #{mid} order by cdcode

select sc.mid, sc.cdcode, sc.fecode, sc.tdcode, to_char(sc.scdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as scdate, td.*, fe.* from schedule sc left join tdest td on sc.tdcode = td.tdcode left join festival fe on sc.fecode = fe.fecode where sc.mid= #{mid} and sc.cdcode = #{cdcode} order by sc.scdate
select * from tdest where ctcode = #{ctcode} and tdcode not in(#{tdcode}) order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM()
mapper.delete: delete from schedule where mid = #{mid} and cdcode = #{cdcode}
delete from calendar where mid = #{mid} and cdcode = #{cdcode}
mapper.update: update calendar set cdstate = 'N' where mid = #{mid} and cdcode = #{cdcode}
mapper.select: select * from calendar where mid = #{mid} and cdcode = #{cdcode}
select * from schedule where mid = #{mid} and cdcode = #{cdcode}
select * from schedule where rownum between 1 and 1 and scdate > sysdate order by scdate

select.if: select * from tdest where ROWNUM <=30 order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM()
select * from festival where ROWNUM <=30 order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM()
select fename from festival where fename like '%'||#{searchInfo}||'%' and rownum <= 6
select tdname from tdest where tdname like '%'||#{searchInfo}||'%' and rownum <= 6
